title: My ping just lowered from mid/high 60's to mid 50's for no reason this past week. (SOCAL)
body: So, I'm not complaining, but I am curious on the reason for this. Since the server move I have lived in 2 places with 3 different ISP's. I lived in Anaheim (getting low 60's), then to the mountains in San Bernardino (getting mid/high 60's), changing my ISP to a newly added private Fiber company in the area didn't change my ping but this last week it just dropped to mid 50's. Super rad! But why? Was it something on Riot's end or should I be sending a gift basket to my ISP thanking them?

replies.body: Thanks! It's a small ISP and the connection just got up and running a few months ago, so most likely they have been figuring stuff out. XD
